articles.description: We answer a lot of important questions about the new Bajaj Freedom 125 CNG motorcycle
articles.content: The world's first CNG motorcycle, the Bajaj Freedom 125, was recently launched in India. We have received a lot of questions regarding the bike. People want to know its safety aspect, range, variants… [+1960 chars]
